mapper.select:

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_cnarea( id, parent_id, parent_ids, area_code, name, sort, type, create_by, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area_code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_cnarea SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_code = #{area_code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_cnarea SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
